name: Cosmic GO!
description:
Welcome to a Cosmic Augmented Reality Experience!
Choose your favourite racing ship and drift around to get points in a series of fun mini games!

- Drive inside racing tracks or drift crossing portals!
- Jump and collect Tokens!
- Get all the Cosmic Challenge racing spaceships and Go far enough to unlock the Golden Skins!
- You can choose the best decoration color for all of them!

- Compare you best local records with people online around the world!
